DaisyAD_ThroughHole.synopsis: On arrival in colony. If through hole in tower and you did go through prison

DaisyAD_ThroughHole_SkippedPrison.synopsis: On arrival in colony. If through hole in tower and you did not go through prison

DaisyAD_ThroughPrison.synopsis: On arrival in colony. Through prisonAn illithid colony. Right under the tower. This must be where they are getting the tadpoles.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There are three sessions. The session 'DaisyAD_ThroughPrison' is triggered when the player goes through prison, and then later the session 'DaisyAD_ThroughHole' is triggered upon arrival in the colony by going through the tower hole after having gone through prison. In contrast, 'DaisyAD_ThroughHole_SkippedPrison' is triggered on arrival in the colony when the player goes through the tower hole but does not go through prison. Thus, if the player goes through prison, they will experience 'DaisyAD_ThroughPrison' followed by 'DaisyAD_ThroughHole'. If not, they instead trigger 'DaisyAD_ThroughHole_SkippedPrison'. This makes the session 'DaisyAD_ThroughHole' (and its preceding 'DaisyAD_ThroughPrison') mutually exclusive with the session 'DaisyAD_ThroughHole_SkippedPrison'.

DaisyAD_ThroughHole_0.text: Tread carefully. We are very close to the source of the Absolute now. That telepathic storm has become a tempest.

DaisyAD_ThroughHole_SkippedPrison_0.text: This is an illithid colony. The source of the tadpoles must be in here, somewhere.

DaisyAD_ThroughHole_SkippedPrison_1.text: Tread carefully. That telepathic storm is now a tempest.

DaisyAD_ThroughPrison_0.text: An illithid oubliette. Right beneath the Towers. A colony must be close. That must be where the tadpoles are coming from.
